name: Rythmic
description:
Description

This game was developped by some students during a training. It uses the Python arcade' game library.

The goal is to press the buttons at the correct moment, when the moving gems cross over the central ones.

According to the distance between the moving gem and central gem, your accuracy score will be updated. If you press the button when there is no gem, or the gem is too far, your score will decrease strongly. Whatever the distance of the gem, when you press a button, the closest gem to the center is destroyed.

Controls

Just press the keyboars arrows LEFT/RIGHT/UP/DOWN or any gamepad controller buttons A/B/X/Y according to the direction of the moving gem.

Download

Repository

The GIT repository is available here.
